comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The former Sarah Cantine Shrady(c1870-1951) married Edwin Gould in 1892; they had two sons. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edwin_Gould_I If it's Sarah, this is her stepfather: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Frederick_Shrady,_Sr. Their son Edwin Jr. died in a hunting accident at Jekyll Island, 1917, age 23. www.jekyllclub.com/news/May09/history.htm

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Marion daily mirror., July 02, 1907, Image 2 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn88077573/1907-07-02/ed-... ha a piece on Sarah Shrady Gould with a picture that could well be the same woman.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the info and links pennylrichardsca and swanq. It does look to be Sarah, so we'll add her name to the record.
